org.billtorcaso.Stopwatch

Class StopwatchInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.billtorcaso.Stopwatch.StopwatchInstance

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class StopwatchInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides class-static services for a shareable singleton Stopwatch object.

    The shared stopwatch object allows legacy libraries to use this Stopwatch for timing, without adding another parameter to the legacy API.

    There is one accessor method that returns a reference to the shared Stopwatch object, and three convenience methods for recording moments and tasks. A stopwatch operation that is not listed below must use the shared Stopwatch instance returned from get() to call other Stopwatch methods. 

    
 StopwatchInstance.get()
 StopwatchInstance.taskBegin()
 StopwatchInstance.momentAdd()
 StopwatchInstance.taskEnd()
    Author:
    Bill Torcaso
    See Also:
    Stopwatch, StopwatchFactory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Stopwatch sharedInstance
      This is the singleton instance
      private static java.lang.Object sharedInstanceGuard
      This object is used only to guard synchronization of the shared instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private StopwatchInstance()
      The constructor of StopwatchFactory is private, in order to make the class a singleton with services provided only through class-static methods.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static Stopwatch get()
        This class-static method is the only way to get access to the shared Stopwatch object.
        Returns:
        a reference to the shared Stopwatch object

      • release

        public static Stopwatch release()
        This class-static method is the only way to discard the existing shared Stopwatch instance and create a new one.

        Note that any existing reference to the previously-shared object instance will remain valid. Libraries or modules with a reference to that object will continue to use it.

        Returns:
        a reference to the new shared Stopwatch object instance

      • taskBegin

        public static long taskBegin(java.lang.String title)
        This class-static convenience method invokes Stopwatch.taskBegin(title) on the shared Stopwatch instance.
        Parameters:
        title - a String object.
        Returns:
        the long value returned from Stopwatch.taskBegin(title)
        See Also:
        taskBegin

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        main() runs a small exercise of StopwatchInstance methods.
        Parameters:
        args - an array of String objects.

        Run it as 

             $ java -jar Stopwatch.jar   org.billtorcaso.Stopwatch.StopwatchFactory;

     or

     $ java -cp .   org.billtorcaso.Stopwatch.StopwatchFactory;
